mapper.select: SELECT `user`.id id,`user`.user_name userName,`user`.phone phone FROM `user_taobao_address`,`user` WHERE user_taobao_address.`user_id`=`user`.`id` AND `user`.`phone` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{phone}),'%') AND `user`.`user_name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{realName}),'%') GROUP BY user_taobao_address.`user_id` ORDER BY user_taobao_address.gmt_datetime DESC LIMIT ${pageNo},${pageSize}

SELECT `user`.`user_name`,`user`.`phone` ,`user_taobao_address`.id,`user_taobao_address`.user_id,`user_taobao_address`.address,`user_taobao_address`.gmt_datetime,`user_taobao_address`.upt_datetime FROM `user`,`user_taobao_address` WHERE `user`.`id`=`user_taobao_address`.user_id AND `user`.`phone` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{phone}),'%') AND `user`.`user_name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{realName}),'%') LIMIT ${pageNo},${pageSize}

SELECT count(DISTINCT(user_taobao_address.`user_id`)) FROM `user_taobao_address`,`user` WHERE user_taobao_address.`user_id`=`user`.`id` AND `user`.`phone` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{phone}),'%') AND `user`.`user_name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{realName}),'%')
mapper.sql: id AS id, user_id AS userId, address AS address, gmt_datetime AS gmtDatetime, upt_datetime AS uptDatetime
